snippet.title: Car burst into flames at Port Wakefield
snippet.content: A CAR has burst into flames at Port Wakefield - but fortunately no one was hurt. Emergency services were called to Port Wakefield Hwy about 8.15pm on Friday after receiving reports of a car was on fire. The car had reportedly just refueled and had a LPG tank. Firefighters managed to extinguish the blaze and no one was injured. The cause of the fire is unknown.
